issue.title: [Java] AllocationManager: Allow managing different types of memory other than those are allocated using Netty
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7329](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7329). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is related to an unfinished part[1] in the fix of ARROW-4714.

And this is more or less related to ARROW-7272. Buffers in VectorSchemaRoot converted from arrow::RecordBatch should be managed by Java-side buffer allocators.

[1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4348/files#diff-2c2d410f62740cf71f70127f5888f6edR84
